Player History
Drafted in 33rd round, 522nd overall pick, by Brooklyn in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2015, off Kim Prahl (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/2015, off Gerald Henriquez (CHI)...

Was claimed off waivers by Montreal on 2/17/2017.
Injured on 6/10/2017 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
